events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and your resume looks promising.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your background and skills in software development.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be reaching out soon to discuss the next steps.
The initial screening call went well. You demonstrated strong technical knowledge and relevant experience.
Thank you for your prompt response to our questions during the screening. We appreciate your enthusiasm for the role.
Your technical interview is scheduled for May 15th at 3 PM. Please prepare to discuss your past engineering projects.
You successfully completed the technical interview and demonstrated excellent problem-solving skills and coding expertise.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 18th at 11 AM to discuss your fit with company culture and benefits.
The HR interview was positive. You showed great alignment with our values and communicated your career goals clearly.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position including competitive salary and benefits.
You have given positive feedback about the offer and confirmed your interest in joining the engineering team.
You accepted the offer officially. We're excited to have you join our engineering department soon.
Your onboarding process has started. Welcome to the team! We will support you through your first days here.
The hiring process is now complete. Congratulations on joining the company as a Software Engineer.
